Context:
* The Sunnybrook location of George Brown College is home to various academic centers and schools.
* Onsite Information Sessions occur twice a year, in late November and January. Interested individuals should contact the program office at (416) 480-5783 or email ask.george@georgebrown.ca to register.
* The Sunnybrook location is at 2075 Bayview Avenue, U-wing, Ground Floor, Toronto ON M4N 3M5.
* Parking lots around the Sunnybrook location can be found on parkopedia.ca.
* There is a Sunnybrook Centre for Independent Living at the same address.
* Individuals can use the TTC Trip Planner to find directions to the Sunnybrook Location.
* Contact information: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca.
* George Brown College website content is subject to change without notice.
* Application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more can be signed up for on the website.
